Eric Schmidt , previously CEO of Novell and CTO of Sun Microsystems, has by far the most enterprise experience in the triumvirate that runs Google, which also includes co-founder Sergey Brin . Eric Schmidt clearly had passion for enterprise software, says Gartner analyst Whit Andrews. "He cared about enterprise software. He worked at a lot of companies that sold enterprise software and bunch of enterprise products. That history is not in place with Larry Page ."
